channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 16th April
item.description:
28 day with give and take please place new gully cover over chamber 500x350x50mm stats required (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 16th April
item.description:
dead tree and feels it could be at risk of falling in the near future and would like it checked out for safety, the grund appears to be cracking around it
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor road condition/potholes/craters, 16th April
item.description:
Please can this area finally be resurfaced! It is opposite Wade Court and has been very poorly repaired numerous times. The road surface is very poor and needs sorting properly! It is unavoidable as it covers the width of one lane! Fed up with reporting this!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath blocked, 16th April
item.description:
The footpath heading west from the marked position is blocked by a gate topped with barbed wire. The sign indicating the presence of a footpath is overgrown and indicates that the path should lead beyond said gate. The wooden fence blocking access to the footpath from the new housing development has been mentioned in somebody elseâ€™s previous report.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Betula Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 16th April
item.description:
